title: Sushi Samba
typeOfFood: Japanese, Beer/Wine, Fusion, Brazilian, Peruvian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Fusion sushi restaurant, bar and lounge with international locations. Offers a separate vegan menu (ask for it) which includes sush rolls; appetizers like edamame and roasted peppers; tofu and eggplant skewers; Peruvian corn, purple mashed potatoes; and dessert. Reported it's still open as of Sept 2015.
